content.question: The function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative x to the power of 4 plus x cubed plus 20 x squared"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a global minimum between <math alttext="x equals negative 4"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.

​​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a global maximum between <math alttext="x equals negative 4"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.

​​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a global minimum between <math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.

​​​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a global maximum between <math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.

content.answer: ​​​<math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a global maximum between <math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 5"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>.

topic.text: 1.4: Polynomial Functions and Rates of Change

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
